EmailTemplate.name: Global_Product_Email_Pivotal HD Launch.Webinar Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading Pivotal HD Single Node VM
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Register for Our Webinar and Get Up to Speed on Pivotal HD Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for downloading Pivotal HD Single Node (VM). To better get you started we will be hosting a new webinar series on the first Thursday of every month. "What You Can Do With Hadoop" Webinar series will contain both technical and business topics, use cases, thought leadership from industry experts, customer examples and more.
Our first webinar – Exploring Pivotal HD Single Node (VM) – kicks off Thursday, August 1st, 2013 at 9 AM PST <http://play.gopivotal.com/PivotalHDLaunchWebinarSession1.html> and 7PM PST <http://play.gopivotal.com/GlobalPivotalHDLaunch2.html> respectively.
During this one-hour exploratory webinar you will:
- Get an introduction to Pivotal - Learn what's inside Pivotal HD Single Node (VM) - Understand how to use Pivotal HD Single Node (VM) effectively - See use cases and tutorials - Get your questions answered
Register today for the 9 AM session <http://play.gopivotal.com/PivotalHDLaunchWebinarSession1.html> Register today for the 7 PM session <http://play.gopivotal.com/GlobalPivotalHDLaunch2.html>
Thank you,
The Pivotal Team Stay current on all things Pivotal Visit our blog >> <blog.gopivotal.com> Pivotal HD Community Forum Join Now >> <http://www.gopivotal.com/community/pivotal-hd>
